## I. Load the data
```{r}
library(readxl)
url <- "https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/machine-learning-databases/00350/default%20of%20credit%20card%20clients.xls"
destfile <- "default_of_clients.xls"
curl::curl_download(url, destfile)
df <- read_excel(destfile)
names(df) <- df[1,]
df <- df[-1,]
```
